index.title: Push Notification Sample using .Net SDK - Windows - Dev Center - Appacitive
index.description: A simple Windows Phone app demoing Push Notification feature provided by Appacitive Platform.
index.keywords: push, push notification, .net, samples, .net samples, .net sdk samples, appacitive, .net sdk
index.header_app_description: Learn how to setup a push channel and listen to it using Appacitive .Net SDK in a Windows Phone App backed by Appacitive Platform.
